values:
Its finally summer =)
& I couldnt be happier

The end of the school year finally came
around and I loved every second of it

Softball season is over for the most part
and my team finished in 1st place

Over the past couple of weeks I've realized a few things:
1. I have the most amazing friends. TLCB forever.& SmamaNa
   2. I'm in love............
      3. I have the coolest mom you will ever meet
          4.& I'm getting paid


Last night Nadine and myself went to the mall
& she bought some sunglasses
Then we went to Beth's house, and partied
We watched DirtyDancing (which is the most amazing movie)
We slept over there and woke up at 12
& now I'm at home


I said "Maybe, You're gonna be the one that saves me"
And after all, you're my wonder wall

Well :)
I am one very happy girl at the moment
& I'm 15.
& I like this boy.
& I think he likes me too.
& I have the best friends in the
whole entire world, and I dont know
what I'd do without them in my life.


Field day was yesterday.
My team was the bomb.
Our name was Lane's Lovers.
& Lane was our captain 
.. obviously
It was me, Tbo, BGabs, Bryan,
Lane, and Kyle, & we dominated in speed ball
:)








1. Write the name of a person of the opposite
sex.
2. Which is your favorite color out of red,
black, blue, green, yellow?
3. Your first initial?
4. Your month of birth?
5. Which color do you like more, black or white?
6. Name of a person of the same sex as yours.
7. Your favorite number?
8. Do you like California or Florida more?
9. Do you like the lake or the ocean more?
10. Write down a wish. (A realistic one).
.
.please don't look ahead before you write down the answers on a sheet of paper
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
THE ANSWERS
1. You are completely in love with this person.
2. If you choose:
Red - You are alert and your life is full of
love.
Black - You are conservative and aggressive.
Green - Your soul is relaxed and you are laid
back.
Blue - You are spontaneous and love kisses
and
affection from the ones you love.
Yellow- you are a very happy person and give
good advice to those who are down.
3. If your initial is:
A-K You have a lot of love and friendships in
your life.
L-R You try to enjoy your life to the maximum
and your love life is
soon to blossom.
S-Z You like to help others and your future love
life looks very good.
4. If you were born in:
Jan-Mar: The year will go very well for you and
you will discover that you fall in love with
someone totally unexpected.
April-June: You will have a strong love
relationship that will not last long but the
memories will last forever.
July-Sep: You will have a great year and will
experience a major life changing experience for
the good.
Oct-Dec: Your love life will not be too great,
but eventually you will find your soul mate.
5. If you chose...
Black: Your life will take on a different
direction, it will seem hard at the time but
will be the best thing for you, and you will
be glad for the change.
White: You will have a friend who completely
confides in you and would do anything for you,
but you may not realize it.
6. This person is your best friend.
7. This is how many close friends you have in
your lifetime.
8. If you chose:
California: You like adventure.
Florida: You are a laid back person.
9. If you chose:
Lake: You are loyal to your friends and to your
love. And you are very reserved.
10. This wish will come true only if you RE-
POST THIS BULLETIN in one hour., and it will come
true before your next birthday.



Comment<3

Wow. Last night was soo amazing.
A big thank you goes out to Chris Scanlon
for going with me :)

It was clearly one of the best nights of my life
haha and all the drama was worth it.

There was soo much dancing going on..
& yes I had myself some pretty damn good
dance partners , & I think you all know who you are

Tomorrow is the Hockey State Finals at the Fleet
YAY PANTHERS :)
GOod luck to all my boys.

Comment <3

Im updating for Nadine :)

February vaca was alright.
I traveled all over Florida to visit
grandparents...soo you knowwwwwwwwww

This week was our first week back at
school, and it went by pretty fast.

Friday was Marie's surprise party :)
It was sooo much fun.
I love you guys soo much. 

Saturday I hung out with Beth & Tory
forever. Then Tory's basement flooded
& Caro showed up, and then Jason came over.
We got kicked out of her house, so we went
to Caro's. And we didnt really do anything.
haha but i love the nerdherd.

I got a new cell phone.
Same number.
But you should leave yours <3

Updating .. finally.

Well .. Wednesday was school, and then I 
went to the Marlboro/Westboro Hockey Game.
We won 9-3. And I saw a friend of mine :)


Friday I hung out with Tory, and we did
absolutely nothing.. it was soo depressing.

Saturday me and Tory went to another
Hockey Game, Marlboro/Worcestor.
We won again, 8-0. & then we went back
to Tory's and watched the LadyBugs w/
Caroooo. 

Today I was supposed to have softball 
practice, but the janitors forgot we were
coming in and they locked the school on us.

And tomorrow is Valentine's Day. And Caro
and I have decided we're gonna skip school
and go to Boston, because we'll both have
a depressing day. haha but that wont happen.



ohhh you.
<3333!@#$%^&*()
i hope it happens.

Comment!!

Wow. I love 2 snowdays in one week :)

Well .. as if everyone didnt know this..
Sunday the Pats made it into the SuperBowl.
I watched the game at C's with T & B
good times .. !!!!!@#$%^&*()

Monday I didnt really do anything..
but I did watch it snow .. and snow..

Tuesday was school, and we took midterms

And then Wednesday was another snow day :D
haha but all I did was study for more midterms

Yesterday I didnt do too much .. the SnowBall was
yesterday .. but I didnt go

Todayyyyy was a good day <3
We got our new schedules for this semester
Foods 1 with DANCETEAM!

Tonight I think I'm watching the varsity game??
Call my cellular telephone.


P.S.
VOLLEYBALL!!
9 a.m.
THIS Sunday
Masonic Hall
:0 !!! YAY!!

Okay well .. my 4-day weekend didnt go as planned
.. but thats okay, I'll just make the next one better.

Friday night I hung out with my family !!!!!@#$%^&*

Saturday night i babysat with Tory & I lost
at a game of Battle Ships to an 8-year old boy..

Sunday Beth came over and we watched the Pats game :)
& looked at the pictures on the brianpsmith.com website
haahhaa .. only Beth knows what that means to me ..
Then we went to Tory's with Caro and tried to watch Garden
State .. buuuuut we all had movie ADD and so we baked a cake.

Monday me and Tory went to Ward Hill and boarded for a while, 
but it was soo cold that we gave up at like 4:45 .. 
Then we went to see Coach Carter and there were millions of
people there .. it was absolutely craaaazy...

Tuesday consisted of cutting up magazines for my English 
mid-term project .. Romeo & Juliet :) and Panera Bread.

& today starts the first week of mid-terms, but I have it
easy .. today was my gym final, tomorrow is my Applied Tech
final, and then Friday is my Math mid-term.

But next week is going to be SUCH a killlll




<3

and yet she still sits there smiling,

regardless of fake friends and dreams that are broken,

regardless of the guys she loved & the hearts that were broken,

but yet, youll never ever break her

 

i only roll with the best ..

i love all my friends.

I havent updated in a whiiiiiiile.

Christmas was reeally good this year.
I got a new snowboard and an iPod :)

Monday not too much went on.
I went to Beth's that night with Tory
& we've decided that:
Lindsay = rare
Beth = medium
Tory = well done
hahaha

Tuesday was the PDC reunion!!!!!!!!
& a very Happy Birthday to Tucker & Kyle.
A bunch of us went to Julie's house after
I miss you guys WAYYYYYYY too much.

Wednesday consisted of going to the mall with Caro & Beef
Me and Beth waited around while Caro saw a movie ;)
and then on the ride home .. haha well nevermind

Today I FINALLY went snowboarding with Tory, Caro, and Jackie
We were supposed to go up to Wachusett, but ended up at Ward
Still .. we had some fun

Tomorrow is New Year's Eve .. :D
2005 here we come..
I dont know exactly what I'm doing yet


<33 Comment

Finally .. V.A.C.A.T.I.O.N Christmas Eve is tomorrow !! & I cant wait for New Year's haha & a select few of you know why<3 Carolyyyyynnnn .. can you COME?!
      
volleyball is love
brought to you by the isLove Generator
That would be correct!!!!!!!<333!!!!!!! Comment <3 and we'll hang out during vacation

Wow .. I havent updated in a while.
Here we go ...

Christmas is in 6 days! I cant believe how fast it came.
Time really flys by. We only have 4 more school days until vacation =D

Friday night was exactly like every other Friday night.
The girls all came to my house and we gave presents and ate chinese.
And then Jason came over just like he does every Friday night.
We all played ping-pong in my basement .. and attempted to watch Elf.

Last night was sooo much fun. We finally went bowling =)
Me, Beth, Caro, and Na met Raffy, Brian P., Brian S., Ryan, and Kevin there.
And we played some cosmic bowling .. yaaaaay!!
(We should do that every Saturday night)

Friday is Christmas Eve, and Saturday is Christmas =D
Vacation here we come......!

This was a good weekend :)

Friday I went to Tory's and dyed her hair
&might I add that I did a fabulous job
Then I hung out at her house with Caro, and Nadine
Then Jason showed up and we partied like no other
We played cards, aaaand read some books ;)


Saturday consisted of Christmas shopping with
Nadine and Tory.. and it was craaazy
I didnt do anything that night .. but I know
some people who had a good time .. hahaha


Sunday I went over to Beth's and we made chicken
Then we went to CCD .. ehh but still managed to have fun


I lost my voice
& try-outs for the musical are this week
What am I supposed to do??


This weekend we should all hang out at my house.
yess yess yess .. <33

I love how fast the weeks go by.
It feels like it should be Tuesday

Fall Sports Awards Banquet tonighttttt
yaaaay for volleyball =)

I have to say .. me and Tory dominate in gym
We score a good half of the goals
.. I love gym <3333  ;) 




Leave something for me BABE!
<33333333333333333333333333

I think I have my weekend plans all figured out:

Friday .. Free Concert at Hollister!
Piebald is playing .. and they're amazing.

Saturday .. Im thinking the Freshman Football Game
with Caro and possibly Marie =D

ewwww and that means Sunday I have CCD.




Comment please.
You are the winner
but you dont even know <333

Its snowing
<333333333
And so the season begins =)


Comment Pleasee.

"Hey can you tell grandma to come pick me up?"
"No Napoleon, She's at the hair salon."
"Then can you at least bring me my chapstick?"
"No Napoleon"
"But my lips hurt real bad!"

haha what a weekend.

Friday: was Kevin's surprise party!! Happy 16th Keviiiiin!
Me, Beth, and Amy had lots of fun that night =D
"WOW .. see that log in the tree?"

Saturday: was Tory's party. haha 
Well, it started out as a girls night... 
We sang to Grease & danced around in front of the camera, and it was fun...
then Jason showed up and we played back some of the tape, 
and some other embarrassing tapes from when we were little .. wow ..
 and we went and visited Dixon!! 
We walked to the field
and it was dark and scary .. 
and then went back to Tory's and watched some Napoleon Dynamite =)))))))))))))) 

Sunday: we woke up this morning and had cake .. 
yesssahh Marie ... !!
and we all left and now im getting ready for church and ccd =/


I cant wait until it snows ..
so that we can all go snowboardinggggg
and this will be the year I dont break anything doing so 
... haha



<3333 Comment.

Halloween was Sunday.
Need I say more?

I saw the love of my life at the Natick Mall.
Julie Moran! haha That was for you Julie <333



Comment <33

Arent we just the best looking team?

& we most definetly have the most fun <333

Today was our last volleyball game =(
.. aww I love you girls .. <333333333
hah .. "DO the menopause one!" .. heh

I loved this week.
so very very much.
Nothing went wrong =)

& Im thinking that Im taking a break
from livejournal for a while .. 



"Hey Millis .. your mom called .. she said .. YOU SUCK!"
amaaaaazing season laaaaaaaaaadies =)


<3

We lost our our volleyball games this week =/
& it hasnt been a very good week .. at all



I have nothing to do tonight
 .. as usual


Yard Sale
Saturday the 23rd
My House
9am to 1pm
 .. Im thinking of putting my self up for auction


<33

Long weekends make my life <3333

Friday was homecoming

Saturday was a movie with Caro ..

& Caro and Tory sleeping over .. caffine like WOAH
(haaaaah good times at Avalon already)

Sunday consisted of absolutely nothing.

Monday was our volleyball game
& Caro and Beth at my house for the night
we saw a  s h o o t i n g star :)
and we made a wish.

Tuesday was a full day of Beth, volleyball practice,
and a pasta dinner at Panera Bread with the team :)

Yesterday went by soooo fast
And we won our game in Milford :)
I played middle back all three games,
which I thought was really weird.
I never play middle back .. ever

Today was alright
.. and then it started raining
but I like the rain :)
& its my sisters birthday


<33333333 comment.

{ You look so good in blue }

I just got back from the homecoming game.
Let me tell yah .. we lost.
But only by three .. it was 17-14, Gardner
Then my dad went to the high school instead
Of Kelleher field ..  and he was really really late,
And there was this fight going on,
And I thought I was going to die .. ..
Well not really ....... but .........


I had three volleyball games this week.
All of which we won :)
No one ever goes to the volleyball games ..
But maybe they will on Monday at 6


The pep rally was today
And volleyball won the Spirit Stick ..
which is a HUGE deal.
We were military people .. and we had a song :)


ahhhhhhhh .. ha;lkfhalkhg B O Y S al;ifh;lskhg;alk



comment. comment. comment.
ill love you forever. <33

This entire week is Spirit Week :)
& theres a pep rally on Friday
yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay

We won our game today and that made me really happy
& then Beth came over and 
we went for a walk like we always do
& iI fell off the sidewalk .. 

g o o d t i m e s

I have to say that the boys at school are more
attractive than I thought they were the first few weeks
.. but me and Beth are the unfortunate ones with no boyfriends.
ohhhhh well. Theres this one who lives in another town..
& he's amazing .. but theres no chance in hell for me. haha

I cant wait for this weekend .. 4 days of no school:)


<3

Tonight was awesome because we beat Hudson
& because I played the whole second game
& I got all my serves over .. except one

Tomorrrow I think DANCETEAM might be 
getting together for a reunion.
YaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaY


I have nothing to do so
Ill chat with you later

<3

C a r o l y n J e a n M c H u g h.
This entry is for you.

I cannot believe you're going to be 15.
We've been through so much together
& We have yet to go through so much more.
You were my very first best friend,
I've known you since I was 3
& We'll be best friends forever.
I know more about you than anyone else
& I know you know more about me than anyone else
We understand eachother in a way no one else does.
I hope you have the best 15th ever.. I love you!!


I visited my dad's new condo today :)
It's at Avalon Orchards near 7-11
Apt. number 3 in Building 9
.. come visit me


I feel humongous.
& really really gross.
& I'm still sick.


 

Oh, When the day is blue
I'll be sitting here wondering about you
And have the pollen fall
All around your face in strange yellow patterns

Well .. I finally got the sickness thats been going around.
I managed to get through a day of school yesterday
& two 45 minute bus rides to and from volleyball..
but I stayed home from school today because I felt terrrrible.



Right about now Im missing a volleyball game somewhere
against St. Peter Marian .. but I can deal with that.
We have a gigantic game against Westboro (!!) on Tuesday at 6


I have absolutely nothing to do at the moment
excpet be sick .. or do some of the homework I never
got around to doing........... call me someone??


<23456789

I'm sorry but I'm just thinking of the right words to say

I know they dont sound the way I planned them to be

But if you wait around a while I'll make you fall for me

I promise you, I promise you .. I will


 

Sunday-My whole family went to the Brady's house and we partied and schtufffffff
I had lots & lots & lots of fun <33333333 :)
After the Bradys my mom took me to some concert
it was on the common on main street.. but it was weird
haha so she took me home

Monday-I didnt do too much at all.

Tuesday-I had a volleyball scrimmage at Lincoln-Sudbury
.. we lost .. both games
Right after that was that fall sports meeting at school
& by the time i finished homework and dinner it was 10:30

Wednesday-I found out that I'm on the JV Volleyball team
& that my name was on the wrong list :))))))
we had practice and then I went home

Today-was yet another practice and the usual schoolwork ect....

Tomorrow-Spirit Daaay! The whole team is wearing our uniforms..& our game is tomorrow at 3:30 in the gym .. you should come

(( our shirt, spandexxxxx, and orange socks ))

 

 

ydarb ttocs .. ohhh im soo shy <3

Well Friday was fun.

I went to volleyball and then went back to Beef's for a run.

She came over later and we rented Revenge Of The Nerds 2.

(( we watched the first one at her house ))

We had a crazy time...

Me: Whos Pao?

Beth: Who CurrrrZzZz

 

Beth: Is she moving to Texas?

Me: I hope so.

 

Me: She looks like a giraffe.

Beth says nothing at all.

Me: Or a dinosaur.

 

The other night we were checking ringtones...

Beth: Say my name is Annie and I want a pizza...

Me: My name is Annie and I want a pizza

Beth: not literally .. its a ringtone.

^ g o o d t i m e s  Beef.

I just discovered how to put pictures in :)

I'm soo excited ..  and in two minutes I'm putting in a picture.

 

<3 Lindsay

Well I have to say that the first week of school was wonderful.
I havent gotten lost and all my classes are pretty good.
I have 2nd lunch and its reeeeally good.
Jeanine and Missy and Casey and Marie and Kayla and Mia and Beth and a bunch of other people are in it with me ... lots of kids from drama :)

<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3


I found out that I made the volleyball team.
I'm on freshman .. but I played up with JV today in a scrimmage.
& I did pretty damn good :)

Practice is tomorrow at 10 .. and its our day offfffffff 
arrrrrr,  but I loove it so i'll go.


I'm thinking tonight calls for a smama
are you busy ladies??

<3


P.S.
Missy is still my girlfriend HEH HEH

School starts tomorrow.
How scary is that?
ummmm.. v.e.r.y.


Thursday I saw Napoleon Dynamite with Nadiiine. And it was the greatest movie everrrrrrrrr! haha


Friday I walked around Boston with my dad and sister & it wasnt horrible.. we shopped around and spent quality time together :)

Saturday I baked a cake with Beeeeeefy .. & it was goood. and then later I went and saw a movie with Beeeeefy and Jess and Matt and his brother.. The Bourne Supremacy, me and jess kept leaving to hide out in the bathroom, and we watched some football in the lobby ... good times Jessicaaaaa<3 ( Matt and Beth needed to be alone ;) )

Sunday I didnt do anything at all .. but it was hotttttt out.

Today I died my hair back to that red it was for the play .. and I think ill keep that for a while. I also went to Volley Ball practice//tryouts .. and it was a lot of fun .. I hope I make the teeeeeeeeeam.

Tomorrow is school .. and I might have lunch with JACKIE!!!!
I hope I do!!!!!!!! That would make my life! <33333333

<3

aaaaahhh ... I got my camp pictures back :)
They're pretty good .. but I dont have very good photographing skills, haha
My favorite is the one of JORDAN , the one of me and B-rad


I went to the Natick Mall with Beef today and we got some things, and had some funn. It was all in all a good time. I still however dont know what I'm doing tonight .. I wanted to see Napoleon Dynamite, but I dont think thats happening.


Is anyone free maybe tomorrow?? I know I am :)
Give me a buzz .. 508.400.5883 (assuming I'm not home)

Me and Beef finally bought the Armor For Sleep CD .. aww yessssssaaahhhhhhhhh


Comment biatches
<3

I havent updated in a while, but the very first thing I would like to say is that I miss my Beefy!! Beth Kirby Gabrielli. I feel like I havent seen you in forever & I have soo much to tell you<333333333


Sunday I went school shopping with Caro at the mall. I got some pretty good clothes for the start of the year, & it was fun spending some quality time with Caro, haaaaaahh Pac Sun<3 .. I almost had a <3 attack.. but I dont feel like getting into any details.


Yesterday I ended up going to the highschool..found my locker & homeroom, and im thinking about trying out for volleyball, haha im not gonna make it .. i'm too short.                ^is anyone else trying out??


aslfjbdg;ljbsdgojnsgojsnglasnf;as
only one more week.
seven days.
7x24 hours until school starts

ehhhhhhh.

<3

Oh my gawddddddd camp is over .. I'm soo sad. Today was a craaazy day. It was like 90 degrees outside and we had a million little kids all over the place and randomly screamed yay (?) for no apparent reason. haha Ketchup, Micaela :)
I made a lot of tips at the end of the day so thats good .. but I dont know if I'm getting hired backkkkkkkk .. and I really hope I do. The end of the day wasnt as bad as I thought it would be .. because I honestly thought I would cry. B-rad gave me a trillion hugs and so that made my whole day.

Tonight was Nikki M's partyyyyyyy. Micaela, Nikki A, Julie, Jill, Scuba, Barnaby, Brian, Asher, Carolyn Sam and Me were there. haha We went swimming in the rain, and lots of craaazy stuff. Brian hit me in the face with the tennis ball and when I went to throw it back at him I hit Asher in the butt. hahhhhhhhhhhh. Julie might have a party next weeeeeeek!!

I really need to go school shopping, I havent done anything yet. I wanna go to the Natick Mall reeeally bad, and that would make my life.


ehh I think I have to go to a gaay cook-out family thing tomorrow.


<3

Only 4 more days left of camp
& 15 days until school starts
oh myyyyyyyy.

Rainy days at camp suck.. alot.
WoW .. Alden House with Micaela is soo craaazy. "You look like ET" .. Ying and Yang, haha Tommy, aaaaaaaaand all the other retarded things we do :)

-----> Staff party on Thursday :) 
We should all do something after.


ohh my gawd .. my dance team needs to get together soon ..   before school starts.. because we havent seen all of us in a while (?) Savannah & Beeeeeeeeeth


Singing in the rain
Siiiinging in the rain
What a glorious feeling
I'm happy again ...


<3

Look I changed the picture in the background all by myself :) I might need Missy's help to fix some more of it tho .. heh heh

I went to Hampton today with Jeanine and Taylor .. and we saw Nadine and Marie there! haha I got a Henna tatoo and some stuff for a dollar. shexxy.

Here's my schedule for school:
 
homeroom 219R
A- honors algebra
B- applied tech // comp applications
C- Phys Ed // Drama :)
D- honors english
E- honors latin
F- honors IBE
G- honors world history

^anyone have anything with me?

Last week of camp next week :(
I love you guys forever<3

I want to take ballet classes :) really bad
so Im lookiting for pointe shoes on ebay

<3

Staff party next Thursday.
All of you better be there :)

School starts soon .. and everyone got their schedules today.. i have mine .. but i havent looked at it yet 'coz its at my moms house. But I know I got into drama.. which I'm very excited about :)!!! I'll post the rest of the stuff when I read it.

I got a sunburn today .. because I decided not to wear any sunscreen, and Julie made me get in the pool. Julie I miss Plymouth with you! Gramps is amazing !!



I wanna go bowling this weekend.
'Coz bowling is awesome.

<3

I bought a dress on Sunday :)
It looks like one from the '20s .. that flappers would wear.. & i loove it and it was only $17. Then I bought a jean jacket.


& I have to say .. the boys at camp .. are really really hot. I kn0ow the other girls from camp will agree with me & I'm gonna bring a camera & take pictures, as living proof :)


Who wants to do something this Friday or Saturday...cause I never do anything on the weekends..and so I'm getting bored. Someone call me?


<3

HAPPY BIRTHDAY BETH KIRBY GABRIELLI!
I LOOOOOOOOOOVE YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


Today was coooool.
My dad let me drive the car in an empty parking lot. I didnt do too horribly..actually I'd say I'm a natural. I cant wait until I get a car.

My dad took me to Ruby Tuesdays.. and I saw Sarah there! woo-hoooooo.. and our waitress came up to me and said "Oh my gosh.. you were Peppermint Patty.. I'm one of Sarah's friends and I came and saw your play!" haha it was coooooooooool.

Then I went to DQ and I saw DANCE TEAM! & her one of her friends. It was suhweeeeeeeeeeeet, that pretty much ended my day.. because I dont think I'm doing anything tonight..as of yet.

<3

PDC i love you guys and I'm soo happy to be back!
Today was Olympic Day & I was on the orange team.
((We came in 3rd))

Nikki A. & Emma I'm gonna miss you sooooo much!

Tonight I went to Kiss Me Kate.
Ben  had a lead role .. and he did G.R.E.A.T
I met Steph there .. and I also saw Missy Anne!
I loove you Missy ;]

Next week I'm stuck with Alden House .. with Micaela!
WooP wOOp

Beth, Steph, and Micaela's birthdays are tomorrow!
I love you guys & Happy Birthday.




<3

This whole weekend was amazing.

Saturday i bought red chucks & then saw The Village with most of the cast.
Me & Steph pretended we were in love and created a whole dramatic goodbye scenario.
It was so0o0 funny. I miss her already! I miss her as much as I miss the rest of the cast! The very last play went amazingly well. Everyone did a fabulous job
